item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普计划对逾期、超预算的国防承包商实施财务限制
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，特朗普政府正计划出台一项行政命令，限制那些预算超支和工期延误的国防承包商的分红、回购和高管薪酬。【原文：The Trump administration is planning an executive order that would limit dividends, buybacks and executive pay for defense contractors that are over-budget and delayed, according to three sources briefed on the order.】

item.title: 特朗普下令封锁进出委内瑞拉的受制裁油轮，石油上涨 1.5
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下令 "全面彻底 "封锁所有进出委内瑞拉的受制裁油轮，美国原油期货周三上涨超过1%。【原文：U.S. crude futures rose more than 1% on Wednesday as U.S. President Donald Trump ordered "a total and complete" blockade of all sanctioned oil tankers entering and leaving Venezuela.】

item.title: 日本出口连续第三个月增长，美国发货量反弹
item.description: 日本政府周三公布的数据显示，11月份日本出口连续第三个月增长，对美国的出口八个月来首次反弹，这为日本央行继续加息提供了支持。【原文：Japan's exports rose for a third straight month in November, government data showed on Wednesday, as shipments to the U.S. rebounded for the first time in eight months, bolstering the case for the central bank to continue raising interest rates.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局局长称尚未完成出售其在共和航空公司的股份
item.description: 根据周二公开的一封信，美国联邦航空管理局局长表示，他没有剥离其在共和航空公司的股份，但他将继续回避可能影响该航空公司财务的问题。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration said he had not divested his shares in Republic Airways but he would continue to recuse himself from issues that could impact the airline's finances, according to a letter made public on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加州监管机构暂时允许特斯拉继续在该州销售汽车
item.description: 加州监管机构允许特斯拉暂时继续在该州销售汽车，这是该电动汽车制造商被指控虚假营销和夸大自动驾驶功能一案的最新进展。【原文：A California regulator has allowed Tesla to continue selling vehicles in the state for now, the latest development in a case in which the electric vehicle maker had been accused of falsely marketing and overstating self-driving capabilities.】

item.title: 据 Punchbowl 报道，白宫正在准备可能限制军事承包商报酬的命令
item.description: 据 Punchbowl News 周二报道，白宫正在准备一项行政命令，可能会限制军事承包商的股票回购、分红和高管薪酬。【原文：The White House is preparing an executive order that could limit stock buybacks, dividends and executive compensation for military contractors, Punchbowl News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司任命小布鲁斯-马蒂森为新任首席执行官
item.description: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）周三任命小布鲁斯-马蒂森（Bruce Mathieson Jr）为新任首席执行官，他将放弃董事长职位。【原文：Australia's Star Entertainment on Wednesday named Bruce Mathieson Jr as its new chief executive as he relinquishes his position as the chairman.】

item.title: 据 Politico 报道，一些特朗普官员对哈塞特出任美联储主席表示怀疑
item.description: Politico 周二援引三位熟悉相关讨论的人士的话报道称，一些特朗普政府官员私下对可能选择国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）担任下一任美联储主席表示怀疑。【原文：Some Trump administration officials have privately raised doubts about the possible selection of National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett as the next Federal Reserve chair, Politico reported on Tuesday, citing three people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 日本女子与梦想中的虚拟伴侣举行婚礼，绽放人工智能浪漫之花
item.description: 在日本西部的一个婚礼大厅里，音乐响起，身着白色礼服、头戴皇冠的野口百合奈一边擦拭眼泪，一边聆听准丈夫的话语：一个从智能手机屏幕中凝视出来的人工智能角色。【原文：Music played in a wedding hall in western Japan as Yurina Noguchi, wearing a white gown and tiara, dabbed away her tears, taking in the words of her husband-to-be: an AI-generated persona gazing out from a smartphone screen.】

item.title: 美国众议院小组将就停机期间支付空中交通管制员工资的问题进行表决
item.description: 美国众议院的一个委员会计划于周四就旨在通过确保空中交通管制员和其他主要工作人员的工资来防止政府关门期间航空中断的立法进行投票。【原文：A U.S. House of Representatives committee on Thursday plans to vote on legislation aiming to prevent aviation disruptions during government shutdowns by ensuring air traffic controllers and other key workers are paid.】

item.title: 据 Information 报道，Waymo 讨论以超过 1000 亿美元的估值融资数十亿美元
item.description: 据《信息报》周二援引熟悉这家打车服务提供商计划的人士的话报道，Alphabet 旗下公司 Waymo 正在与潜在投资者谈判，希望以至少 1000 亿美元的估值进行融资。【原文：Alphabet unit Waymo is in talks with potential investors to raise money at a valuation of at least $100 billion, the Information reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the ride-hailing service provider's plans.】

item.title: 港口主管称，由于关税影响，美国最繁忙海港 11 月份进口量下降 11.5
item.description: 洛杉矶港执行董事吉恩-塞罗卡（Gene Seroka）周二表示，在托运人提前建立库存以避免美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对玩具、汽车零部件和金属家具等商品征收关税之后，美国最繁忙的海港 11 月份的进口吞吐量比去年同期减少了 11.5%。【原文：The nation's busiest seaport handled 11.5% less import volume in November than in the year-ago month after shippers built early inventories to avoid President Donald Trump's tariffs on goods such as toys, auto parts and metal furniture, Gene Seroka, executive director of the Port of Los Angeles, said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 购房需求下降，伦纳季度利润疲软
item.description: 美国住宅建筑商莱纳（Lennar）周二公布的第四季度利润不及华尔街预期，原因是经济承受能力压力继续拖累购房需求，导致该公司股价在盘后交易中下跌超过 4%。【原文：U.S. homebuilder Lennar missed Wall Street's estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, as affordability pressures continued to weigh on homebuying demand, sending the company's shares down more than 4% in after-hours trading.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，精神航空和边疆航空有意合并
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，破产的精神航空控股公司（Spirit Aviation Holdings）正在与前沿集团控股公司（Frontier Group Holdings）商讨合并事宜。【原文：Bankrupt Spirit Aviation Holdings is in discussions to merge with Frontier Group Holdings , Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易日：美国失业率阴影笼罩
item.description: 数据显示，美国 11 月失业率升至 4.6%，为四年多来最高，美元和国债收益率随之下滑。【原文：Wall Street mostly fell on Tuesday - the Nasdaq bucked the trend and rose - while the dollar and Treasury yields slid after figures showed the U.S. unemployment rate in November rose to 4.6%, the highest in more than four years.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，墨西哥国家石油公司（Pemex）授予五份合同以提高石油产量，但未能吸引大公司参与
item.description: 据四位熟悉内情的消息人士和路透社看到的一份文件称，墨西哥国营石油公司 Pemex 原计划在今年年底前签订 11 份新的合资企业合同，现已签订了其中的五份。【原文：Mexican state oil company Pemex has awarded five of the 11 new joint venture contracts it had planned to ink before the end of the year, according to four sources familiar with the matter and a document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，贾里德-库什纳的 Affinity 退出华纳兄弟收购战
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引贾里德-库什纳（Jared Kushner）的投资公司 Affinity Partners 代表的话报道称，该公司已退出华纳兄弟发现公司的收购战。【原文：Jared Kushner's investment firm Affinity Partners has withdrawn from the takeover battle for Warner Bros Discovery , Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing a representative for the firm.】

item.title: 消息人士称，华纳兄弟可能拒绝派拉蒙 1084 亿美元的出价，支持 Netflix 参与竞购战
item.description: 据熟悉此事的消息人士透露，华纳兄弟 Discovery 董事会最早可能在周三宣布对派拉蒙 Skydance 1,084 亿美元收购要约的决定，董事会可能建议股东投票反对该收购要约。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery's board could announce a decision as early as Wednesday on Paramount Skydance's $108.4 billion takeover bid, with the board likely to advise shareholders to vote against the offer, according to sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 黑客组织 "ShinyHunters "声称主要性网站 Pornhub 的用户数据被盗
item.description: 黑客组织 "ShinyHunters "周二称，它窃取了知名性网站 Pornhub 高级用户的数据。【原文：The hacking group “ShinyHunters” said Tuesday that it had stolen data belonging to premium customers of the leading sex website Pornhub.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，Citadel 的格里芬敦促白宫与美联储 "保持距离
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，随着经济顾问凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）成为领导美国中央银行的热门人选之一，Citadel 公司首席执行官肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）敦促唐纳德-特朗普总统在美联储和白宫之间拉开 "距离"。【原文：Citadel's CEO Ken Griffin has urged President Donald Trump to create "distance" between the Federal Reserve and the White House, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, as economic adviser Kevin Hassett emerges as one of the frontrunners to lead the U.S. central bank.】

item.title: 美国就业数据公布后铜价下跌
item.description: 铜价周二回落，原因是投资者评估了最新的美国就业数据，而年底流动性稀缺加剧了价格波动。【原文：Copper prices retreated on Tuesday as investors assessed the latest U.S. jobs data while thin year-end liquidity exacerbates price swings.】

item.title: X 公司起诉社交媒体初创公司，要求获得 "Twitter "品牌所有权
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司周二起诉了一家初创公司，该公司试图取消 X 公司的 Twitter 商标，以便将 Twitter 作为一个新的社交媒体平台 "带回来"。【原文：Elon Musk's X Corp sued a startup on Tuesday after it sought to cancel X's Twitter trademarks so it can "bring Twitter back" as a new social media platform.】

item.title: 达拉斯联储文件认为联邦基金利率传导效果减弱
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行（Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas）的最新研究为央行改变利率目标以实现其货币政策目标提供了依据。【原文：New research from the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas is building the case for a change in the interest rate the central bank targets to achieve its monetary policy goals.】

item.title: 博斯蒂克称，更多降息可能重燃通胀，损害美联储信誉
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周二表示，进一步降息可能会使美国的货币政策处于宽松的基础上，从而刺激经济增长，并使美国面临通胀和通胀预期再次飙升的风险。【原文：Further interest rate cuts could put U.S. monetary policy on an accommodative footing that stimulates economic growth and puts the country at risk of a new jump in inflation and inflation expectations, Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Apollo Global 考虑以约 120 亿美元的价格出售 Atlas Air
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道称，阿波罗全球公司（Apollo Global）正在权衡出售旗下空运公司阿特拉斯航空公司（Atlas Air）的可能性。【原文：Apollo Global is weighing a potential sale of its air-freight company Atlas Air, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI 启用英国前财长奥斯本领导全球星际之门扩张计划
item.description: OpenAI 公司周二表示，已任命英国前财政大臣乔治-奥斯本（George Osborne）为总经理兼 "OpenAI for Countries "计划负责人，该聊天金沙国际娱乐网址正加紧努力，与各国政府合作制定国家人工智能战略。【原文：OpenAI has appointed former British finance minister George Osborne as managing director and head of its "OpenAI for Countries" initiative, the company said on Tuesday, as the ChatGPT maker ramps up efforts to work with governments on national AI strategies.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：中国要求获得巴拿马港口交易的控股权
item.description: 华尔街日报》周二援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道称，中国已经提高了要求，现在正推动国有船舶运营商中远集团在一项价值 228 亿美元的港口交易中获得控股权，该交易涉及巴拿马运河附近两个有争议的港口。【原文：China has upped its demands and is now pushing for state-owned ship operator Cosco to get a controlling stake in a $22.8 billion ports deal involving two contentious ports near the Panama Canal, The Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马斯克 X 被欧盟罚款后，美国威胁采取反制措施
item.description: 特朗普政府周二威胁说，如果欧盟服务提供商继续采取美国贸易代表办公室所称的 "歧视性 "行动，将对其采取一系列报复措施，包括可能收费或限制外国服务。【原文：The Trump administration on Tuesday threatened a wide range of retaliatory measures against EU service providers, including possible fees or restrictions on foreign services, if the firms continue what the USTR called "discriminatory" actions.】

item.title: 特斯拉加大对德国千兆工厂电池芯的投资力度
item.description: 美国汽车制造商特斯拉周二在一份声明中说，特斯拉正在创造条件，从2027年开始，在其位于柏林附近格鲁海德的德国千兆工厂每年生产多达8千兆瓦时的电池芯。【原文：Tesla is creating the conditions to produce up to 8 gigawatt hours of battery cells a year at its German gigafactory in Gruenheide near Berlin starting in 2027, the U.S. automaker said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 16 个州起诉特朗普政府暂停电动汽车充电基础设施项目
item.description: 由 16 个州和哥伦比亚特区组成的一个团体对特朗普政府提起诉讼，控告其暂停了两项针对电动汽车充电基础设施的两党赠款计划。【原文：A group of 16 states and the District of Columbia filed suit against the Trump administration for suspending two bipartisan grant programs for electric vehicle charging infrastructure.】
